attributes.action: the prime minister should focus on the employment strategy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister needs to focus on the employment strategy and see how he can deliver if he wants his reputation of being the PM in the next election. We need a leader to get things going not a leader too busy focusing if his reputation will fail. I dont know whats it like to be the prime minister but MR Brown seems a good guy. Please Mr Brown help us to get back on track and maybe we will help you to win the next general election. Everyone is counting on you and push the expenses claims to one side as its being dealt with.
